cpl.readme:
Alternative to my [[Tiddlersbar (breadcrumbs) plugin|http://tongerner.tiddlyspot.com/]], based on the work of [[Rich Rath (rcrath)|https://github.com/rcrath/TW5-TabStory/issues]].
Here the breadcrumbs are on top of the story-river. It works best in Zoomin view. <<< ''Note:''
''This plugin needs my $:/plugins/tg/layout plugin for general layout settings (available at http://tongerner.tiddlyspot.com/).'' <<< Settings for the layout can be found in ''~ControlPanel > Appearance > [[Plugin tweaks|$:/plugins/tg/layout/tweaks]]''.
cpl.title: $:/plugins/tg/tabstory
cpl.author: TonGerner
cpl.name: Tabstory
title: Plugin_202203244126043
